directions: Bring carrots, water, and butter to a boil in a small saucepan; reduce heat to medium and simmer for 10 minutes. Add honey and rosemary; continue simmering until carrots are tender, about 5 minutes more.
ingredients: 4 large carrots, peeled and cut diagonally into 1/4-inch slices
title: Honey Rosemary Carrots
